    • Course

      public Course(String id, String title, int credit, String department)
      Constructor to initialize the course with specified id, title, credit, and department.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the course
      title - the title of the course
      credit - the credit value of the course
      department - the department of the course
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if id, title, or credit are invalid
